message.body: Hey! We're heading to midtown continental! Still coming out?

Aaaah no I'm sorry! My show is on Friday and now everyone at the coffeeshop is saying they are coming (all the regulars, my boss, etc.) and now I am super nervous about it and just want to work on my paintings til Friday - I promise to come to DC to visit You tho instead
Did you end up doing homecoming??
Aww, well good luck with the show!! You didn't tell me about it! In heading back soon anyway. Def come visit me in dc!
I hope I sell some paintings and make some waves!!

My coworkers are all a little snarky about my paintings, bc they're men and sometimes condescending (tho they have few outside interests themselves!) so I want to impress them and embarrass them a bit hehe
